What is KWIC?

Your boss wants your new application running on Azure NOW, but it needs to securely connect to your existing infrastructure. Setting up a site-to-site VPN between your data center and the public cloud is going to take way too long.
KWIC (KAAZING WebSocket Intercloud Connectivity), pronounced as quick, delivers simple, secure, hybrid cloud connectivity. No hardware required.

Tell me more!

Why KWIC?

KWIC was created to help customers simplify and improve connectivity when there is a need to broaden the reach of their native services beyond the corporate firewall to the extended enterprise.

Tell me more!

How Can I Get Started?

KWIC is easy. 3rd grade easy.
You need to access your Active Directory or another LDAP server on your enterprise network? It's absolutely FREE! No strings attached, no caveats.

Oh, and WAIT - did we mention it was EASY?

Tell me more!

Self-paced tutorial to highly secure cloud connectivity.

3rd grade easy. And FREE, too.
